VARIABLES.name: y_AE_direct
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for direct link between A and E

VARIABLES.name: y_AE_path
VARIABLES.description: Indicator variable for path link between A and E

VARIABLES.name: x_AE_direct
VARIABLES.description: Quantity of the direct link between A and E

VARIABLES.name: x_AE_path
VARIABLES.description: Quantity of the path link between A and E

PARAMETERS.name: Bandwidth_A_E_direct
PARAMETERS.context: Direct bandwidth between A and E

PARAMETERS.name: Bandwidth_A_E_path
PARAMETERS.context: Path bandwidth between A and E

PARAMETERS.name: Bandwidth_D_E_path
PARAMETERS.context: Path bandwidth between D and E

PARAMETERS.name: Bandwidth_A_B_path
PARAMETERS.context: Path bandwidth between A and B

PARAMETERS.name: TransmissionEfficiency_A_E_direct
PARAMETERS.context: Transmission efficiency of the direct link between A and E

PARAMETERS.name: TransmissionEfficiency_A_E_path
PARAMETERS.context: Transmission efficiency of the path link between A and E

PARAMETERS.name: TransmissionEfficiency_D_E_path
PARAMETERS.context: Transmission efficiency of the path link between D and E

PARAMETERS.name: TransmissionEfficiency_A_B_path
PARAMETERS.context: Transmission efficiency of the path link between A and B

OBJECTIVE.query: maximize the bandwidth of the link between A and E

CONSTRAINTS.name: sum_of_bandwidth_at_least_100
CONSTRAINTS.query: The sum of bandwith is at least 100.

CONSTRAINTS.name: transmission_efficiency_A_E_decreases_by_10_percent
CONSTRAINTS.query: If the direct link between A and E is selected, the transmission efficiency of the path decreases by 10% due to the long distance between the two nodes.
